snippet: For better or worse, struggling bands often spend their own money to play the South by Southwest Music and Media Conference in Austin, Tex.
abstract: Unknown bands from around country spend thousands of dollars traveling to South by Southwest Music and Media Conference in Austin, Tex, where they will play, mostly unpaid, for new audiences in hopes of landing record deal.
lead_paragraph: For better or worse, struggling bands often spend their own money to play the South by Southwest Music and Media Conference in Austin, Tex.

headline.main: Paying a Price to Play at South by Southwest
headline.print_headline: Paying a Price to Play at South by Southwest

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: South by Southwest Music and Media Conference
